name: Rusty Jim's Cornycopia
description:
Rusty Jim's Cornycopia

It's an incredibly tiny pretty game for Ludum Dare 45!

A travelling salesman has given you some magic beans. Ace! He says they'll only grow in a well-tended garden. Use your watering can (and your chicken pals) to keep the garden going.

Controls:

Mouse moves the watering can

Scollwheel to tile the camera

Click to water the crops!

Made by Rusty Jim:

Adam (@rustyjimgames) Code and music.

Emily (@emzamara) Art.
